dataset_info.name: unlabeled_ophthalmic_dataset
dataset_info.description: Self-supervised learning dataset - No labels required

medical_record.history: 58-year-old male with type 2 diabetes mellitus for 15 years. Reports gradual vision changes over past 6 months.
medical_record.physical_exam: Visual acuity OD 20/40, normal intraocular pressure.

samples.notes: This sample is used for self-supervised pre-training. No diagnosis or CoT labels are needed.

medical_record.history: 72-year-old female presenting with metamorphopsia in left eye for 2 months. Family history of AMD.
medical_record.physical_exam: Visual acuity OS 20/60, mild cataract noted.

samples.notes: OCT scan for contrastive learning with clinical text.

medical_record.history: 45-year-old female with hypertension, routine screening examination.

samples.notes: Normal case for learning healthy retinal patterns.

contrastive_learning.description: Model learns to match images with their clinical descriptions
contrastive_learning.augmentation: Apply strong augmentations (color jitter, rotation, cropping) to create multiple views

masked_modeling.image_masking: 15% of image patches will be randomly masked for reconstruction
masked_modeling.text_masking: 15% of words in clinical text will be masked for prediction

data_preparation.text_quality: Clinical text should be descriptive and medically accurate, but does not need labels
